Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier loss of power near East Prairie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier loss of power near East Prairie. 


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
